import React from 'react' import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row' import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col' import { BottomNavigation, ImageWrapper, SectionDesc, SectionTitle, SectionWrapper } from '../../../../SectionsComponents' import { AtticMobile } from './index' import { useDeviceDetect } from '../../../../../Helpers' /* IMAGES */ const FooterHands = '/Assets/Images/Attic/FooterHands.png' const FooterHandFirst = '/Assets/Images/Attic/FooterHandFirst.png' const FooterHandSecond = '/Assets/Images/Attic/FooterHandSecond.png' export const SectionFooter = () => { const { mobile } = useDeviceDetect() return (
{AtticMobile.map((mobile, index) => ( ))} {mobile ? ( <> ) : }
) }
